channel.title: Resistance on Archive 03
channel.description: Recent content in Resistance on Archive 03

item.title: How Reliable Are Support and Resistance Lines on Price Charts?
item.description: A debate on the reliability of ‘support’ and ‘resistance,’ the core of technical analysis. Three characters explore the value and inherent risks of these lines, from seeing them as traces of market psychology and a treasure map for timing trades, to the pitfalls of subjective interpretation and lagging indicators.
